front.title: OAM tool for RBridges: Multi-destination Ping

abstract.t: Unicast and multi-destination data frame may follow the different path in TRILL network. We need the ping and traceroute like applications for the connectivity testing and fault isolation on the multi-destination path in addition to the unicast path. This document specifies the format and handling of the new TRILL OAM protocol messages and TLVs which can be used for the multi-destination OAM.
